item.title: Maven Hospital Challenge
item.description: 1. Maven Hospital Challenge Introduction 1.1 Challenge Objective For the Maven Hospital Challenge, you’ll play the role of an Analytics Consultant for Massachusetts General Hospital (MGH). You’ve been asked to build a high-level KPI report for the executive team, based on a subset of patient records. The purpose of the report is to give stakeholders visibility into the hospital’s recent performance, and answer the following questions: How many patients have been admitted or readmitted over time?
